intro.paragraph1: Orbital Temple ye satellite erimu omulimu gw’ekikugu: ekijjukizo mu bwengula ekiggule eri buli kitonde ekitegeera ekibeera oba ekibadde kibeera ku Nsi.
intro.paragraph2: Okuyita mu tekinologiya, omuntu yenna asobola okuweereza erinnya ly’omuntu mu Yeekaalu, oba omuntu eyafa, omuntu omulamu ennyo, oba ekitonde kyonna ekisaanira okujjukirwa.

sculpture.heading: Ekibumbe
sculpture.paragraph1: Ekifaananyi kino kirina ebintu bisatu ebikwatagana: setilayiti naddala eyakolebwa okutereka obuwumbi n’obuwumbi bw’amannya; ekibumbe eky’olukale nga kiwanyisiganya amawulire ne setilayiti; n’omukutu abeetabye mu kutendekebwa mwe bayita okusindika amannya, okuva kati okutuusa lwe gayitiridde, mu ggulu.
sculpture.paragraph2: Nga kaweefube ow’enjawulo, Orbital Temple esobola okutwalibwa ng’ekibumbe ekikwata ku kifo ekimu, ekibeera mu bwengula. Era pulojekiti ya Artsat.

antenna.heading: Antenna Nga Ekibumbe Eky'olukale
antenna.paragraph2: Antenna egenda okubeera mu mpuliziganya butereevu ne setilayiti egenda mu nkulungo ekolebwa.
antenna.paragraph3: Nga tulina enjuyi eya zaabu etunula, ng’endabirwamu y’eggulu waggulu waalyo, y’entandikwa y’okusikirizibwa kw’amasasi (oba enkolagana yaffe n’ekyo ‘waggulu awo’).
antenna.paragraph4: Wadde ng’ebibumbe bino tebiteekeddwa mu bitundu by’ensi ebisinga obungi, Frames zaffe okuva ku nsi, mu kiseera kino ezifuga setilayiti, zisindika amannya ku buli kifo we ziyita.
antenna.paragraph5: Yamba okuleeta okwolesebwa kuno mu kibuga kyo —okuteeka ebibumbe bya antenna ebikubiriza emboozi ezikwata ku kunoonyereza mu bwengula, ebifaananyi, n’ekifo kyaffe kye tugabana mu bwengula. Manya ebisingawo ku kuwagira pulojekiti eno .

imageAlts.riseNy: Yeekaalu ya Orbital ku Rise NY
imageAlts.installation: Yeekaalu ya Orbital eyawandiikibwa Clara Marques

imageCaptions.riseNy: Yeekaalu ya Orbital mu bwengula. Okulaga ebifaananyi mu ngeri ya 3D nga RiseNY&Partners.
imageCaptions.mercosul:
Okuteekebwawo kwa Yeekaalu ya Orbital mu Mercosul Biennial, mu Porto Alegre, Brazil.
Ekifaananyi kya Clara Marques.
